resources.string:
"
If this description will not answer your question, contact us via email: the button in the right will redirect you.

"
"LOGIN
" "Open the application. The authentification credentials are the ones given from the coordinating" "team from Earth - the username is the unique id given at the beginning of the mission. In " "case of login problems or forgetting the login data, please contact the coordinating center " "manually from the spaceship. 

"
"START CONVERSATION
" "If you want to start a new conversation the three dot menu from the right-upper corner will" "redirect you to a list of persons including the team members from spaceship, the coordination team " "from Earth responsible for the mission and other people directly involved in the mission. " "When you choose a person from the list a new conversation screen will appear.
" "If you already started a conversation with a person you can search and reopen it using the " "search menu bar. Type the username of the person you want to chat with, like "Mona" or search" "by date like 12.02.2017(DD.MM.YYYY).

"
"CHANGE PASSWORD
" "Change password submenu can be accessed from the three-dot menu option "Setttings". In order to get " "your password changed retype twice the actual password and enter the new password twice. The password " "must contain at least 10 characters including 2 digits. 

"
The old passwords are not the same
The new passwords are not the same
